text: Slim Chaker (24 August 1961 - 8 October 2017) was a Tunisian politician. He was born in Sfax, Tunisia. He was a member of the Nidaa Tounes party. Chaker served on the cabinet of Moncef Marzouki and Beji Caid Essebsi. He served as Minister of Public Health for a few months in 2017. He also served as Minister of Finance from 2015 to 2016 and Minister of Youth and Sports for a few months in 2011. Chaker died in Tunis, Tunisia from a heart attack after taking part at a marathon on 8 October 2017 at the age of 56.Le ministre tunisien de la santé, Slim Chaker, meurt après avoir participé à un marathon ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Tunisian politicians
title: Slim Chaker
